text_block_list.text: One day, a few days before the 'Selection Race' where Uma Musume appeal their abilities to trainers for scouts―

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Wow! What speed!

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: *pant *pant *pant *pant

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: She's got incredible momentum! It's still before the race, but it might be a good idea to scout her―

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer B
text_block_list.text: Isn't that Yamanin Zephyr? It's true that speed can be useful on short-distance tracks, but you might want reconsider.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer B
text_block_list.text: Some say she doesn't have a passion for racing. It's hard to train an Uma Musume like her…

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Oh! Ms. Zephyr! Hello!

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Oh, Ms. Flower. You're a nice breeze like Hananobu style as always.

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Eh? Umm… Th… Thank you?

text_block_list.name: Rookie Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Senpai! Look! It's Nishino Flower. She's nice too, isn't she?

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer B
text_block_list.text: Yeah. It's great that she has passion in racing. That's where she differs from Yamanin Zephyr.

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: …Umm! I… I don't think you should let it bother you…! You were just taking a break due to an injury…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Thank you for your concern. But it's true that I have't participated in any 'Selection Race' yet.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: The calm wind does not sway the ears, and the clouds do not move. Am I serenity or the storm? It is natural to be suspected.

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: M… Ms. Zephyr you're always so calm! That may be why misunderstandings like this happen…

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: I respect you for being calm even when things get tough!

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Fufu… Ms. Flower is like a flowery wind that spreads the scent of cherry blossoms. But really, please don't worry about me.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer B
text_block_list.text: Look, It's Teio. Looks like she's doing final adjustment for the race.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: …! I'm sorry, the hurricane started whispering to me. We're in the middle of conversion, but please excuse me.

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Ah… Ms. Zephyr?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: *pant *pant *pant All right! My condition is good today!

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: I can feel your wind. It's like a blue storm. Please, allow me to feel more of it.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I don't know what you are talking about… Do you want to compete with me… or something?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Yes. I will swallow your wind, and become an even bigger wind…!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Interesting! I'm fine with that! But, are you sure you can keep up with me!?
Yamanin Zephyr and Tokai Teio, the two are engaged in a fierce battle.
However, there was no clear settlement. Eventually both of their legs came to a stop.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa… Phew, I guess it's a draw.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa… So it seems.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: …I'm sorry that I rudely interrupted you during your training. I really wanted to race you.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: It's ok. But, why me?

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Just as you yearn to be like the 'Emperor', I also have a 'Wind' that I want to become. A tempest that blows high into the sky.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: That's why I didn't want to lose to you.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: So… In other words, in order to become like the Uma Musume you've longed for, you can't lose to anyone, right?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: I don't really know what the wind is like, but I know how you feel! But of course, the one who will win at the end will be this invincible Teio-sama!
Looking at Zephyr with a determined expression― Our eyes met.
choice_data_list: I see you found your rival
I see you found your rival

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Well… you're saying something like the white south wind blowing during winter. Comparing my current self with Ms. Teio, calling her a rival…

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: Unlike her, who is expected to play an active role in the front line of 'Classics' in the future, I haven't even made my debut yet.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: I'm a mile runner, and our field is different in the first place. Isn't it normal for a trainer to think matching me with her is like catching the wind with bare hands?
There was certainly a wall of distance aptitude. The two with different aptitudes may never run in the same field. But…
choice_data_list: Because it looked like you didn't give up on the challenge.
Because it looked like you didn't give up on the challenge.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: …You're a strange person.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: It seems both you and Ms. Flower are waiting for the wind. I don't intend to be a weather vane, but… I don't think it will be a bad wind.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: I don't know what I can do to satisfy that expectation, but if you come see me at the 'Selection Race', you might be able to understand me more.

text_block_list.name: Yamanin Zephyr
text_block_list.text: I'll show you that I can run faster than anyone else. So fast that my heart and soul will become the wind itself―!
However, the day of the 'Selection Race'. Yamanin Zephyr was nowhere to be seen.
